contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox settlement<!--more fields are available for this Infobox--See Template:Infobox Settlement--> |name = Klaipėda County |native_name = Klaipėdos apskritis |native_name_lang = lt |settlement_type = [[Counties of Lithuania|County]] |leader_title = |leader_name = |image_skyline = |image_caption = |image_map = Lithuanian-Counties-Klaipeda.svg |map_caption = Location of Klaipėda County |image_shield = LIT okręg kłajpedzki COA.svg |image_flag = Klaipeda County flag.png |latd= |latm= |lats= |latNS= |longd= |longm= |longs= |longEW= |coordinates_type=region:LT_type:adm1st |subdivision_type = [[List of sovereign states|Country]] |subdivision_name = {{LTU}} |iso_code = [[ISO 3166-2|LT-KL]] |parts_type = [[Municipalities of Lithuania|Municipalities]] |parts = |p1= [[Klaipėda city municipality]] |p2= [[Klaipėda district municipality]] |p3= [[Kretinga district municipality]] |p4= [[Neringa municipality]] |p5= [[Palanga city municipality]] |p6= [[Skuodas district municipality]] |p7= [[Šilutė district municipality]] |seat_type = [[Administrative centre]] |seat = [[Klaipėda]] |area_total_km2 = 5,209 |area_note = (8% of the area of Lithuania) |population_total = 378,843 |population_density_km2 = auto |population_as_of = 2008 |population_rank = 3rd of 10 (11.2% of the population of Lithuania) |timezone = [[Eastern European Time|EET]] |utc_offset = +2 |timezone_DST = [[Eastern European Summer Time|EEST]] |utc_offset_DST = +3 |website = }} '''Klaipėda County''' ({{lang-lt|Klaipėdos apskritis}})<ref>[http://www.travelsradiate.com/europe/republic-of-lithuania/klaipedos-apskritis/864478-klaipedos-apskritis.html "Counties within Lithuania - weather and maps"], ''TravelsRadiate'', accessed Feb 15, 2011.</ref> is one of ten [[counties of Lithuania|counties]] in [[Lithuania]]. It lies in the west of the country and is the only county to have a coastline. Its [[Capital (political)|capital]] is [[Klaipėda]]. On 1 July 2010, the county administration was abolished,<ref>{{cite web|title=Dėl apskričių viršininkų administracijų likvidavimo|url=http://www3.lrs.lt/pls/inter3/dokpaieska.showdoc_l?p_id=392936|publisher=Seimas of the Republic of Lithuania|accessdate=21 August 2011}}</ref> and since that date, Klaipėda County remains as the territorial and statistical unit. ==Municipalities== Municipalities are: * [[Klaipėda City Municipality]] * [[Klaipėda District Municipality]] * [[Kretinga District Municipality]] * [[Neringa Municipality]] * [[Palanga City Municipality]] * [[Skuodas District Municipality]] * [[Šilutė District Municipality]] ==Demographics== The ethnic composition in 2001 was:<ref>[http://www.stat.gov.lt/uploads/42_Lietuvos_gyventojai.pdf]</ref> * [[Lithuanians]] 84.2% * [[Russians]] 11.4% * [[Ukrainians]] 1.3% * [[Belarusians]] 1.0% * [[Poles]] 0.3% * Other 1.8% ==References== {{reflist}} ==External links== *[http://regionai.stat.gov.lt/pdf/klaipedos%20apskritis_socdemas_11_25.pdf Social and demographic characteristics of Klaipėda County] *[http://regionai.stat.gov.lt/pdf/klaipedos%20apskritis_ekonomika.pdf Economy of Klaipėda County] *[http://regionai.stat.gov.lt/pdf/Aplinak_Klaipedos%20aps_EN.pdf Environment of Klaipėda County] {{Counties of Lithuania}} {{Klaipeda County}} {{coord|55|41|54|N|21|08|49|E|source:euwiki_region:LT-KL_type:adm1st|display=title}} {{DEFAULTSORT:Klaipeda County}} [[Category:Counties of Lithuania]] [[Category:Klaipėda County| ]] {{Lithuania-geo-stub}}
